My thoughts for the Call to Unite[1]
How books can open your mind by Lisa Bu[2]
Why you should make useless things by Simone Giertz[3]
Why are these 32 symbols found in caves all over Europe by Genevieve von Petzinger[4]
How language shapes the way we think by Lera Boroditsky[5]
What I learned as a prisoner in North Korea by Euna Lee[6]
Success, failure and the drive to keep creating by Elizabeth Gilbert[7]
The power of introverts by Susan Cain[8]
There's more to life than being happy by Emily Esfahani Smith[9]
Grit, the power of passion and perseverance by Angela Lee Duckworth[10]
The power of believing that you can improve by Carol Dweck[11]
Finding Your Element by Sir Ken Robinson[12]
Allow things to unfold and you will find your purpose in life by Peggy Oki[13]
